titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs V1990.074
titlestmt.author: Patricia Glowinski
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-25 13:42:59 +0000.

did.unittitle: Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs

physdesc.extent: three items housed in one folder.

did.abstract: The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954. The Hotel Touraine and the Clinton Garage are shown in the photographs. The photographs are street views and show period cars and trucks.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs consist of three black-and-white photographic prints showing buildings located in the vicinity of Fulton Street and Clinton Street in the neighborhood of Downtown Brooklyn, 1942 to 1954. The Hotel Touraine and the Clinton Garage are shown in the photographs. The photographs are street views and show period cars and trucks.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for anonymously created items remain in effect for 120 years following the date of creation. Based on the date range of this collection, all photographs in the collection will enter the public domain by 2074. For information on securing rights to publish or reproduce, please see the Brooklyn Historical Society Reproduction Rights Policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Walter J. Handleman collection of Downtown Brooklyn photographs, V1990.074, Box number, Object ID number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Item level description and digital versions of images from the collection are available for searching via the image database in the library. Please consult library staff for more information.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Fully processed to the item level.
